executive.title: Digital Marketing Basics
executive.desc: Digital marketing is a term that we all listen to almost every day, as we all are occupied by this trend. So in simple words it is about the promotion of products and services using the electronic mediums. The advanced digital marketing course deals with all the aspects of digital marketing that in other words can be terms as online marketing, internet marketing or web marketing. It includes a huge number of modules in itself. It is not easy define the term but it has helped a great number of businesses in terms of marketing and branding. However, one can make a good amount of money with digital marketing skills as its scope is wide in the industry.

executive.title: Website Development | Creation | Webmaster
executive.desc: One of the most important digital marketing modules is website introduction, as web pages are the best way to grab your visitor’s attention. However, the main game is to make the visitor stay on your page as the average viewers attention is fixed on a website for less than minute. Therefore, it is important to build a website that will help the audience learn something new and also return back to your website. Retention of the audience plays a major role, as what you can show the audience in the first minute once he/she lands on the website.

executive.title: Search Engine Optimization
executive.desc: Search Engine Optimization, commonly named as SEO is one of the most crucial modules of the digital marketing course as it helps in ranking the website. Once you build a website it is important to be seen by the audience. However, the process includes increasing the quality and the quantity of the website traffic. It assists in increasing the visibility of the website. It may be a slow process but it surely makes a huge difference once you rank on the search engines.

executive.title: Google + Bing Ads
executive.desc: Almost all of you are aware of the Google Ads as they are highly prominent; however, it is a way of ranking on the search engines with the help of paid promotions. It is like advertising your product or services on the digital platforms, therefore it is a platform developed by Google. It is a paid service where advertisers pay a cost for the advertisement they want to show. There are several ways to showcase the ads like product listing, video content and several other ways. Learn the best ways to run Google Ads from WAMP Institute.

crash-course.title: Web Development
crash-course.desc: Advanced Digital Marketing Course also focuses on website creation as someone who wants to learn digital marketing surely wants to create a website as website plays an essential role in digital marketing. However, you will learn how to create a website on wordpress and by professionals, and it does not require you to learn any sort of coding. Therefore, once you build a website you are ready to start several things like SEO.
